title: Naughty Love: A Naughty Romance Story
description: Nancy wanted to find true love. Her boyfriend broke up with her due to her resistance to have sex. She was a virgin and had strict moral values. After the breakup, she met a guy who really got her juices flowing. She asked him out, but he turned her down. He already had a girlfriend and intended on remaining faithful to her. Nancy couldn't accept the fact that she couldn't be with him. She started to investigate to see if she could find any dirt on his girlfriend. She would do almost anything to get him to breakup with her, so they could get together. Did naughty Nancy find any dirt on his girlfriend and get together with him and find love? Naughty Love? Warning: This story contains explicit sexual content that is not intended for those under the age of 18.
author: Edward Naughty
